attributes.action: A Ban on remote controlled & robotic methods of warfare & crowd control both domestically & internationally.
attributes.additional_details:
I call for a ban on the use or support in the use of armed drones and an addendum added to the Geneva Convention banning the use of remotely controlled & robotic weaponry worldwide for war or civilian control.

That an innocent knows such weapons fly above them as I type is entirely wrong.

A robotic "Cheater", a "Mule" a "fake soldier used to swell numbers". The asimo robot in Japan can climb stairs. These constructs should be peacefully utilised by humanity for our benefit.

Which General would not weaponise such tools without lawful direction.

please sign.

This is a six month petition ending May 12th 2014.
